page.title: 01Our School
page.content: St.Stephen's R.C.Aided Primary School opens in September 1985 after the amalgamation of the Infant plus Nursery School with the Junior School. When this school opened it was a full Primary School but as the population grew it had to be split into two schools.Now as the population shrinks it is necessary to reamalgamate in order to have sufficient staff to to offer a full curriculum.This inform ation was compiled by several pupils of the Junior School helped by Mr.Hammill the headteacher. We are not used to computers which are just finding their way into schools but we have enjoyed writing our thoughts onto the B.B.C. micro which we use for this project. We study lots of things including Maths, English,Nature, History,Geography Science,Music,Arts, Crafts,Physical Education,Games,Health
